questions.question: The songs from the "Attack on Titan" openings are performed by the band:
What did Hannes do when he first met the Smiling Titan? (Attack on Titan)
options: He fled, saving Eren and Mikasa
He was eaten, paralyzed with fear and unable to move

questions.question: Who saved Mikasa Ackerman from the bandits in "Shingeki no Kyojin"?
The ending of the second season of "Attack on Titan" depicts:
options: Events long before the main plot
Events parallel to the main plot
Events likely taking place after the series finale
